hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash shell_path=/home/jenkins/ci_check # 调测可使用以下代码 # shell_path=/home/jenkins/ci_check2 # mkdir -p ${shell_path} # rm -rf ${shell_path}/* # git clone https://gitee.com/xxx/openeuler-jenkins.git ${shell_path} # shell_path=/home/jenkins/ci_check2
# mkdir -p ${shell_path} # rm -rf ${shell_path} # git clone -b for_kind_codestyle https://gitee.com/wanghuan158/openeuler-jenkins.git ${shell_path} #. ${shell_path}/src/lib/main_process.sh "$OBSUserName" "$OBSPassword" "$GiteeUserName" "$GiteePassword" "$GiteeToken" "$GiteeUserPassword" "$PkgShipUserName" "$PkgShipPassword" "$buddy" "$repo" "$tbranch" "$arch" "$package" "$branch" "$prid" "$WORKSPACE" "$committer" "$commentid" "$SaveBuildRPM2Repo" "$repo_server" "$pkgship_notify_url" "$pkgship_notify_token" cat > hotfix.py << EOF import requests
# 发送请求 x = requests.get('http://120.46.140.206:82/openEuler:/22.03:/LTS:/Next/standard_aarch64/')
#x = requests.get('http://120.46.140.206:82/openEuler:/22.03:/LTS:/Next/standard_x86_64/')
# 返回网页内容 print(x.status_code) EOF
python3 hotfix.py #. ${shell_path}/src/lib/lib.sh #cat /etc/yum.repos.d/openEuler.repo #sudo yum install -y pyyaml svn gcc python3-pip python3-devel python3-Cython JENKINS_HOME=/home/jenkins SCRIPT_PATCH=${shell_path}/src/build BUILD_ROOT=${JENKINS_HOME}/agent/buildroot #git clone https://$GiteeCloneUserName:$GiteeClonePassword@gitee.com/openeuler-customization/oecp.git /home/jenkins/oecp2
#sudo yum install -y https://repo.openeuler.org/openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP2/everything/x86_64/Packages/python3-pyyaml-5.3.1-4.oe1.x86_64.rpm #sudo su - root <<FEOF #pip3 install openpyxl #pip3 install -i https://repo.huaweicloud.com/repository/pypi/simple openpyxl #pip3 install -i https://repo.huaweicloud.com/repository/pypi/simple defusedxml #FEOF
#git clone -b for_test_0516 https://$GiteeCloneUserName:$GiteeClonePassword@gitee.com/wanghuan158/oecp_1.git /home/jenkins/oecp2 #git clone -b openeuler-jenkins-ci-0520 https://$GiteeCloneUserName:$GiteeClonePassword@gitee.com/openeuler-customization/oecp.git /home/jenkins/oecp2
#配置osc function config_osc() { log_info "***** Start to config osc *****" cat >${JENKINS_HOME}/.oscrc <<EOF [general] apiurl = http://117.78.1.88 no_verify = 1 build-root = ${BUILD_ROOT}
[http://117.78.1.88] user = $OBSUserName pass = $OBSPassword trusted_prj = openEuler:22.03:LTS:LoongArch:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:22.03:LTS:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:22.03:LTS:Next:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:20.03:LTS:SP3:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:20.03:LTS:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:selfbuild:function openEuler:20.09:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:20.03:LTS:SP1:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:21.03:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:20.03:LTS:SP2:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:21.09:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:20.03:LTS:Next:selfbuild:BaseOS # 不用输0,1,2了 EOF log_info "***** End to config osc *****" } #config_osc #mkdir -p $shell_path/old_rpms #mkdir -p $shell_path/new_rpms #osc getbinaries --debug openEuler:Mainline alsa-tools standard_x86_64 x86_64 #mv binaries/* $shell_path/old_rpms #osc getbinaries --debug openEuler:20.03:LTS:SP3 alsa-tools standard_x86_64 x86_64 #mv binaries/* $shell_path/new_rpms #mkdir -p $shell_path/oecp_result #mkdir -p $shell_path/oecp_output
#sudo su - root <<FEOF #python3 /home/jenkins/oecp2/cli.py $shell_path/old_rpms $shell_path/new_rpms -o $shell_path/oecp_result -w $shell_path/oecp_result -n 2 -f json -o $shell_path/oecp_output|| echo "continue although run oecp failed" #FEOF #cat $shell_path/oecp_output/report-$shell_path/old_rpms-$shell_path/new_rpms/osv.json
set +x set -e #main set +e set -x
